conclusion: Analyze velocity-time graph to determine when particles A and B are farthest apart.
Particle A accelerates to 2v0 in t0, then decelerates to zero at 2t0. Particle B accelerates to v0 in 2t0, then to 2v0 at 5t0, and decelerates to zero at 6t0.
Calculate distance traveled by particle A from 0 to t0 as v0 t0.
Calculate distance traveled by particle A from t0 to 2t0 as v0 t0.
Total distance traveled by A by 2t0 is 2v0 t0.
Calculate distance traveled by particle B from 0 to 2t0 as v0 t0.
Calculate distance traveled by particle B from 2t0 to 5t0 as 3/2 v0 t0.
Total distance traveled by B by 5t0 is 5/2 v0 t0.
At 2t0, distance between A and B is v0 t0.
At 5t0, distance between A and B is 1/2 v0 t0.
Maximum distance between A and B occurs at 2t0.
